My Work

Check out some of my projects...

These are websites where I built the homepage from scratch using custom markup and dynamic data using the following technologies: C# Razor, HTML5, CSS, Flexbox, Grid, LESS, Javascript, and jQuery

I also used popular frameworks such as Bootstrap and best practices such as BEM methodology.

Please note: I did not DESIGN these websites. These were designed by an in-house design team. I developed the website based off of a designer's comp.

DentalWorks - Portal - Website

Vance Thompson Vision - Sioux Falls - Website

Scott Kasden, M.D. - Plastic Surgeon - Website

These are projects that I built using React, Node, Express, SASS, Postgres bootstrapped with the Create React App CLI.

Houser - Property Management Application

DevWeather - 5-Day Weather Forecast Application

AutoListr - Car-selling application similar to CraigsList
